title: [K-12] Engagement Profile Analysis and Strategy Development in Medical Diagnostic Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Understanding of Diagnostic Procedures
context.additional_context: Technology-Enhanced Learning Environment Using Virtual Patient Simulation Software (BioWorld) to Strengthen Diagnostic Competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the interaction of behavioral, cognitive, and emotional engagement types when performing diagnostic tasks
Learners can identify engagement profiles (cognitive/non-cognitive engagement types) and design learning strategies based on them
Learners can explain how achievement goal orientation, academic self-efficacy, and task difficulty influence engagement profiles
Learners can apply feedback systems that improve diagnostic accuracy based on formative assessment data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
